New Records: Rohit Sharma hit the fastest World Cup century by an India player – off 63 balls
Rohit Sharma eclipsed several records during his 131, including the most hundreds in Cricket World Cup history and the fastest-ever Cricket World Cup hundred by an Indian
Rohit Sharma becomes the leading six-hitter in international cricket
Key Match Events: WICKET! Rohit Sharma b Rashid Khan 131 (India 205-2)
WICKET! Kishan c Ibrahim Zadran b Rashid Khan 47 (India 156-1)
Virat Kohli finishes the game with a four, India win by 8 wickets!
Post-Match Reflections: Winning captain and player of the match Rohit Sharma: It was a good win for us, ot is very important to get momentum at the start
Losing captain Hashmatullah Shahidi speaks: We had above 300 as a target in mind but unfortunately we lost back-to-back wickets in the middle
Miscellaneous Highlights: India were truly imperious with the bat, Rohit Sharma in jaw-dropping form – the emphatic pulls and lofted drives a joy to watch
Shreyas Iyer hits Mujeeb miles over long on to take the crown for biggest six of the tournament so far
